biotools.summary: GeneDive is a powerful but easy-to-use application that can search, sort, group, filter, highlight, and visualize interactions between drugs, genes, and diseases (DGR). GeneDive also facilitates topology discovery through the various search modes that reveal direct and indirect interactions between DGR.
